availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Tom Crutcher (Farmer and Deputy Provost Marshal in Munfordville, Hart County, Kentucky)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Married to E. D. Crutcher. Father of Henry Crutcher, Elizabeth Crutcher, James Crutcher, and John Crutcher. Farmer in Hart County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Hart County in 1860. Deputy provost marshal in the 3rd Military District of Kentucky at Munfordville, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District No. 1, p. 55.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District No. 1, p. 8.
KYR-0002-022-0030.
